definitions.title: n.pr. 1. loc.
definitions.body: (heap, or region of clods; ‘glede’ GASm:G551);—always ´[[חֶבֶל א]]: De 3:4, De 3:14, 1Ki 4:13, ´[[הָא]] :´[[ח]]: De 3:13; = measured region of Argōb; some well-defined district of Bashan (appar. identif. with [[חַוּׁת יָזִיר]] De 3:14 [where ´[[י]] :´[[ח]]: in Bashan, so Jos 13:30], but this a harmonistic correction; ´[[י]] :´[[ח]]: in fact in Gilead [Nu 32:41, Ju Jdg 10:4, and disting. from [[אַרְגּׁב]] 1Ki 4:13 cf. De 3:13); exact loc. dubious, GASm:i.c. and esp. Dr:De 3:4; Buhl:Geogr.18 thinks of Ṣuwet, S. of Upper Yarmuk, a border district between Bashan and Gilead.—Arsob;1Ki 4:13 Erebatam, LXXL Pasaban, A Ersab.

definitions.title: 2. m.
definitions.body: 2Ki 15:25, Arsob dub.; v.Klo Kit Benz Bur.
